description: Detect use of the Windows 8.3 short name. Which could be used as a method to avoid Image based detection
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Use NTFS Short Name in Image
query: ((process.executable:(/.*\~1\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\~1\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\~1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*\~1\.[Hh][Tt][Aa].*/ OR /.*\~1\.[Jj][Ss].*/ OR /.*\~1\.[Mm][Ss][Ii].*/ OR /.*\~1\.[Pp][Ss]1.*/ OR /.*\~1\.[Tt][Mm][Pp].*/ OR /.*\~1\.[Vv][Bb][Ee].*/ OR /.*\~1\.[Vv][Bb][Ss].*/ OR /.*\~2\.[Bb][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\~2\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\~2\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ OR /.*\~2\.[Hh][Tt][Aa].*/ OR /.*\~2\.[Jj][Ss].*/ OR /.*\~2\.[Mm][Ss][Ii].*/ OR /.*\~2\.[Pp][Ss]1.*/ OR /.*\~2\.[Tt][Mm][Pp].*/ OR /.*\~2\.[Vv][Bb][Ee].*/ OR /.*\~2\.[Vv][Bb][Ss].*/) AND (NOT process.parent.executable:/[Cc]\:\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND (NOT ((process.parent.executable:/.*\\\\[Ww][Ee][Bb][Ee][Xx]\\\\[Ww][Ee][Bb][Ee][Xx][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.parent.executable:/.*\\\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]\\\\[Tt][Hh][Oo][Rr]64\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa]\~1\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Zz][Ii][Pp]\\\\[Ww][Zz][Pp][Rr][Ee][Ll]\~1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\\\[Vv][Cc][Rr][Ee][Dd][Ii]\~1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))))
